string_table.name: pxabnsnfns01011101101
string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: Steps in Using a Fire Extinguisher

resource_data.description: Here are some useful links and documents:

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="To practice your proficiency in understanding fire classes please pick up one of the blue squares, guess which class it belongs to, and check yourself by dragging it to the term box on the cell phone this will trigger the cell phone to show you the correct fire class. Practice until you feel comfortable with the different fire classes and then return to the main menu. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="There are three necessary ingredients to keep a fire burning oxygen, heat and fuel. Each of these fire extinguishers will act on one of those three. Click on the buttons on your left to see how each of them functions." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="There are three necessary ingredients to keep a fire burning oxygen, heat and fuel. Each of these fire extinguishers will act on one of those three. Click on the buttons on your left in order to see how each functions. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="The last two sections of this training module will show you how to effectively use a fire extinguisher and how to be prepared in an emergency. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Now that you have completed all of the modules please take the assessment. A score of 80% is considered passing for this module. Good luck. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
